1.content:
For nearly all of your 20-some years of life, you've had a secret obsession that you've kept as private as possible - an obsession with a simple body part. Your own feet. It started out innocently enough...maybe as a kid you noticed your feet were your most ticklish spot, or you loved the feeling of going barefoot on your front lawn....something like that. You've had this obsession so long you can barely remember. And quite frankly, you don't care.

In the years since then, as you've grown up, this little interest of yours has grown with you. You've put in constant effort to keep your feet absolutely immaculate - you treat them to the best creams and lotions you can afford, you give yourself pedicures on a near-daily basis. You want them to be perfect, and they practically are. You can't help but smile when you think about just how soft, smooth, and sensitive they are. Some would call it arrogance, but to you it's just a way of life. You've secretly craved attention to your feet - even a gentle touch would make you happy. But you want so much more. You've dreamed about having them savored - each toe sucked for hours, every inch of your bare soles licked and worshipped. You've fantasized about having them tickled, each sensitive inch explored with every imaginable implement until you're an insane wreck. Your mind wanders to thoughts of having them rubbed and admired for hours, gently and sensually, maybe while someone teases you about the beauty of your feet. Lately you even think about more intimate scenarios - you wonder what it would be like to give somebody a footjob, to use your soles and toes to give somebody true pleasure. All these thoughts fill your head every day - your secret desires of having your feet ravished.

You keep these fantasies all to yourself, though. Even though you know there are like-minded people across the world and online, you keep it to yourself - you don't know what you'd do if a single soul found out. You can't even bring yourself to go barefoot around friends, fearing that you'll raise questions about why your feet are so attractive and pampered. Only when you're home alone do you go barefoot, freeing them and letting your imagination run wild. But someone out there knows who you are. Maybe he doesn't know all your secrets, but he knows a few things about you. He's got many of the same desires as you, only he's the one with the lust for feet. He's been seeking the perfect pair to make his own - to hold hostage, to tickle, to worship, to pleasure himself, to play with to his heart's desire. And he thinks that you have that perfect pair. And unknown to you, he's lurking outside.....

It's nighttime, and you're preparing for bed. You've taken care of everything for the night, except for your favorite ritual. Sitting on the edge of your bed, you pop open a bottle of your favorite lotion. You lift your foot up, preparing to moisturize, but you can't resist stroking your silky sole a few times first, closing your eyes and imagining it's someone else. Eventually you snap out of it, and squirt a healthy amount of lotion into your hand before rubbing it all over your bare foot. You lose yourself for a bit, continuing even after the lotion's already absorbed, slowly coming to a stop and repeating with your other foot. You close the bottle of lotion, satisfied with the job you've done moisturizing your already unbelievably soft feet.

You tuck yourself in, and slowly drift off to sleep. In your final few moments of consciousness, you hear a noise, but you're too close to sleep to fight it, drifting off shortly after. Unfortunately (or maybe not so unfortunate) for you, that sound happens to be an invader, your secret foot admirer.....

Suddenly, another factor comes to your attention. Your big toes, bound together. Tightly enough to prevent your other toes from moving much, but not so much as to cause discomfort. Whoever did this knows what they're doing. You feel a tinge of fear, but your curiosity gets the best of you - how often have you imagined something like this? You try to suppress any fear, even as your inner foot-tease subconsciously comes out, your toes still trying to wiggle.

You swiftly turn around and bolt for the door. All this care for your feet gave you one specific advantage, you were so agile you rarely ever fell down. Yet today, it felt completely different. Time feels like it has slowed down entirely, just so you can see in the corner of your eye, your left foot tapping on an old stand, sending you tumbling near the exit. The commotion makes the stand wobbles and then you see it. A vase, an old pricey looking vase, which by your fault was upside down, flying. Before you can even say sorry, a loud crashing noise buries any word you manage to ramble.

Your face feels strawberry red, you have never felt so embarrassed in your entire life. Still on the ground, you await waves of insults from the owner, but as you look up, you see the old man smiling in a comforting way. He gives you a hand and helps you up. After talking for some time, you learn it's not some ancient relic you broke, but the price is still hefty. The student life is hard and you barely have enough for your rent this month. The shop owner is so sympathetic, he offers you to come back to repay later. You feel like it's almost too nice from him, you could never come back and save yourself a couple weeks worth of food, but this idea churns your stomach. He grazed the idea of some task you could help him with, said it would repay for the vase and more but he needed someone with the rest of the day free.

He pulls you back further in the shop, around a dark corner and points to a big puffy lazy boy, telling you to sit. You obey. still unsure about what's next.

The owner goes around the back of the chair, you get up to follow but he asks you to sit comfortably and wait on the chair, he mentions taking measurements. You don't ask further questions and do as told. He tells you to let your arms hang out, you do so, thinking of how nice the old man is, one hand at a time your wrists are tightened but nothing suspicious comes through your mind. Gazing at everything and nothing in the shop, this scene feels too surreal for you to think properly. Without giving too much attention, you didn't see what was happening around. Your legs, which were planted at each leg of the lazy boy, are now joined together as one. As you try to turn around, your whole body gets pulled to the chair, your wrists are pulled far behind you, your legs feel stuck to the footrest. Pulled back to the maximum, each toe is secured back to another noose at your ankles, keeping your soft, meaty soles all taut.

You called a taxi. You can't make the same mistakes, you still creamed your feet in abundance but you won't make your feet all sweaty again. You get inside the vehicle and pray to whatever god there is for good luck. The ride takes a while, you really made a good decision with this taxi. Arriving at destination, you confirm what you said, that it is a shady club in downtown. You pay the driver a hefty amount of money, fair for the distance, then walk through the club's door.

Looking around, you're surprised. The interior is astonishing, giving it the look of a chic restaurant. You walk up to what seems to be a register held by a small, feminine woman with glasses. She greets you with a smile and hands you some kind of menu. In total confusion, you grab the thing and keep staring at her, which confuses her. She asks you:

Cashier: "Um, Hi! Can I help you sir?"

You babble quickly that it's your first visit here and you're not too sure about how to proceed.

Cashier: "Ah, of course! This here, sir, is what we call the menu. You pick any option you desire and we serve it to you in one of our many private rooms!"

Blushing but with better understanding. You go sit in one of the many empty chairs while making your pick. Evidently, you skip everything until you reach the feet section. You didn't bring your wallet, so you only have the money in your pockets. After meticulous verifications, you can't match any price. On the corner of her eyes, the cashier sees you pouting and waves you to come close.

Cashier: "You look troubled, is there anything I can help you with the menu?"

You explain to her, you didn't think the prices would be this high and you spent a bit too much on travelling expenses. Leaving you with no options but to go back. The cashier looked almost relief as you said you didn't have enough money. She goes through her documents, flipping pages after pages. She stops at one specific page and looks at you over her glasses.

Cashier: "We do have options for people with lesser means, they're almost exactly the same as our regular contracts but with "constraints"."

You ask precisions of these constraints but she swiftly dodges the subject, saying how these options are practically free and exactly the same as the paying ones. You can hardly believe it but what other choice do you have? You don't even have enough money to pay for another taxi which means you'd have to walk.

Yes please or no thank you?
1512311111.title: Maybe I could relax with a foot worship at this...

choices: Test me, I won't break as easy this time...
I'll give them what they want...
15123111111.content:
You accept her dodgy offer. She hands you some kind of contract that you sign on the fly, you hand her back the piece of paper and most of the money you had left before leading you further in a corridor. You see rooms left and right with scriptures on the walls naming the type of services handled in every room. She leaves you in front of a red door at the end of the corridor and tells you to knock when you are ready. You hesitate, you didn't even know what was on the other side. It could very well be something you have no interests in.

After enough questioning, you knock and immediately regret it, probably the adrenaline. The door opens up inviting you in, so you oblige. Inside you see a big lazyboy and stocks. You go livid thinking about being restrained again but as you turn back, the door closes and you're locked in. A big sheet of cloth hides a corner of the room,
so with nothing better to do, you decide to investigate. You go near it, grab the cloth and pull, revealing four clowns on each others. The minute you uncover them, the clown tower falls on you, pinning you down. You are quickly under control and dragged to the lazyboy, one of the clown is holding the stocks open as the others are forcing your ankles into its grip. With four against one, you are once again rendered helpless. This time, your arms are free to move, but being strapped to the chair doesn't leave you much choice. Your feet on the contrary, might be in an even worse position than yesterday, if possible. Now firmly locked inside a set of padded stocks, your ankles were now part with the ground, your feet only moving from left to right.

Four clowns with stupid smiles in front of your own deliriously ticklish feet. For a second time in two days, you had your shoes and socks seductively removed in order to tickle you silly. Can you call this bad luck or, in your case, jackpot? You don't think so.

With your delicate feet at the mercy of these prankster, you didn't know how to react. They were clowns so if you laughed, would they go slow? Maybe if you played tough they would eventually get bored.

What do you say? Play tough or play the game?
15123111111.title: Yes please, I'll take your offer...

151231111111.content:
You decide to go all in. Either they'll get bored or you'll just anger them, anyway you're already strapped in with your most ticklish spot fully exposed. You wait as they get tools. Your soft soles still moist from the lotion this morning, no need for any oil. They take positions and suddenly start all at once at different spots of your feet. Some pinches your toes, others scratches your arches, you feel nibbling on the ball of your left foot. This time though, you don't break into a laughing mess. You clench your jaw and push through the tingling feels all over your feet.

The clowns looked at you surprised, yet doubled in strenght. Slow and soft scratches from forty fingers all at once on your prized feet. Yet it didn't break you nearly as much as the guys from yesterday. Maybe you grew stronger by enduring so much. Seconds turn to minutes as you keep resisting the barrage of tickles coming at you. The clowns are clearly annoyed as you haven't break in almost ten minutes. It then went to a full stop. the clowns turned around and made a little meeting. All while you are trying to control the sensations still on your feet, a diabolical plan is hatching right next to you. Before you have time to react, two clowns force your feet against the stocks while another starts setting up ropes at the top of the stocks. You wonder what these are for. You are being so defensive you keep your toes curled. The shortest of the gang approaches the stocks and with one specific caress along the ridge of your feet, forces your toes to spread the widest you ever could. You try so hard to keep yourself together but constant caresses along this magical weak spot seem to leave your toes exactly where they needed not to be. These shameful touches finally stop, leaving you stunned at how dangerously sensitive your feet can be.

You won't fall for it twice, you try and curl you toes, only to meet new obstacles. This clown special massage had more than one goal. It broke your nerves by showing you how weak you really are. Ever more importantly, the others had time to firmly tie back every single of your toes, tauting them, keeping them spread as wings, unbelievably ticklish wings. You try to pull your feet free but quickly discover you are now way too deep in this you'd like to admit. Your nervousness starts taking over you as one by one, every clown leaves until one stays. You are left at the mercy of the shortest clown of the gang. For some reason, nothing happens, yet. You try asking him or her to free you but you are reminded about the contract you signed.

He or she then walked up to the stocks with a metal box that was set up in front of your defenseless soles. The clown says it shouldn't take longer than five minutes but you still don't understand, until the heat comes on. Directed at your feet, the heater start to make you sweat profusely, the bottoms of your feet glistening with sweat and the residues of lotion. Your skin becoming a tender red. After the five minutes, the short clown came back in. You couldn't take it anymore, your soles felt stinging red yet were so sensitive, the simple wind of the door made you crack up.


The hot sweat opened up all your pores and the lotion entered deep inside. The heater now off, dust could've tickled you crazy. After being tickled at the beach, you thought nothing could compare but you didn't know anything. Your soles have now attained peak sensitivity, you feel all your nerves pulsating vividly. As you are still trying to assimilate such a situation. A single breeze of air makes you hurl insults through screams of laughter. This was only a soft breath along your heel. You now understand how screwed you are. You try to beg your captors but you are cut off by your own socks rammed in your open mouth, tape surrounds your head forcing you to keep tasting your socks. Your eyes widdens as the clowns get closer and closer to your now alarmingly helpless feet.

Let's recapitulate again, can't talk? Check. Can't move? Check. Your biggest weakness is totally obvious and used against you? Check. Can you end up worse? Of course. When you thought hell was about to unleash. The gang backs off of your trapped feet. They do a meeting quickly and look back at you. Three of them leaves again and it could not make you more scared. Once again left with Shorty. You are left to your own imagination while something is plotting. You finally get some attention. The last clown kneels near your defenseless feet. You try to curl your toes but the cords are holding them spread out and ready. You feel something pointy pressing against both your moisturized, heated, already ticklish arches. You fling your arms trying to reach your feet but your just too far. The clown finally adresses to you:

Shorty: "Listen, we're just doing our jobs and you playing tough is really irritating. You're supposed to laugh, like it or not. Since we don't feel like playing with you anymore, you'll sit here in silence while these rotative brushes keep your cute arches some company. I'll come back later to ask you if you enjoyed our services and you better say so. By the way, the room is filmed since you couldn't fully pay. See you later sissy!"

As the clown left, the lights went off. You heard two clicks and felt those said brushes slowly gain speed, tickling away all hopes of getting out soon. Not only are your feet secured firmly, keeping you from kicking the devices away. When setting these up, Shorty over adjusted them so they would continuously scrub your arches for an infinite amount of time. You better be confortable, you're not getting of this ride that easily.
151231111111.title: Test me, I won't break as easy this time...

choices: kick off your flip flops
put your arms up and expose your sides and pits
take your fadora hat off, but close your eyes.
155.content: You dream yourself at the quiet harbour. You were in flip flops and shirtless. You were lying on a bench with your fadora hat on your face. Suddenly, you feel a tickle on you're foot. It was a light stroke on your exposed side of your foot. You think it was an accident, but happened again, except this time on the other foot. You want to pull your feet away, but you realize that the ticklish sensations weren't only coming from the dream, but from the outside world, your bedroom. If you pull your feet away, your tickler will think you won't like it, and will leave. To be honest, you like the tickling. Under the fadora hat, you give a small smile. The tickler was amazed at your endurance, how well you can take the tickling. He decides to take a quick break. You were left alone for 5 minutes. You want to take a peak from your hat. You want to know who this mysterious tickler was. You take a small peak, being careful you won't look at his face and ruin the surprise. The fact of being curious and not knowing who your tickler was made it fun. From your peak, you see a pair of wet tanned feet. Of course this was your dream and these might not be the real feet of your tickler that is actually tickling your real feet. You notice that the feet are taking steps closer towards you. He was coming back! You want to make this 'game' a bit more fun, so you...
155.title: Ticklish Dreams

choices: upper body tickling
feathers and grass
1551.content: When your tickler wasn't looking you kicked your flip flops off. Now your Tanned Bare feet were in the air. Your bare feet were taking the time they had, before they got tickled, to adapt to their surroundings. They felt a cool breeze, which tickled a bit. The newly bare feet were now also getting tanned by the hot sun. Normally you don't like going barefoot in public places. You only ever went barefoot was at home, and even then only in socks. Your body was getting used to this new feeling of barefooting. The tickler was getting closer, you could tell because your brain could feel something next to your feet. The tickler sat down.now noticing that your feet were now bare, assuming the flip flops accidently fell. The tickler smirked. The tickler thought you didn't know about the flip flops and took it to his advantage. He started with two fingers at your left hel. Even with this touch you give the smallest smile, trying not to let it grow. He slowly went up and down along your ticklish, bare foot. Under your fadora hat, you grin. Then he used two fingers in your other foot, repeating the same emotions. The cool breeze same nack, adding more tickles, which threw you off guard. Your smile grew about halfway. The tickler picked up the pace. Every now and then he would go faster, go slower, add fingers, rest fingers. He kept you guessing. He curled your toes back, and lightly scratched the skin underneath with finger on each foot. This made your smile turn into a grin. You are about to lose it. But you want to win this game. The longer this went on, the more it tickled. You start to like it. But the tickler stop. Did he give up?
1551.title: kick off your flip flops

choices: laugh and wake up.
pull your feet away and sleep.
1553.content: Right before he sits down on the bench, you bow your head back, causing your hat to come off. With your hat off, your tickler can see your reaction to the tickling. You close your eyes so that you can't see your mysterious tickler. He comes back, and does the same actions from before, the simple strokes along the side of your foot, except this time a little faster and more tickler. At first you thought you could handle it, but he went a little faster. You start to smile. The fact that this felt like a game, made you want to hold in your laugh. The tickler took note of this and tried to make you laugh. He sped things up every 15 seconds. The faster he goes the bigger your smile grows. Your urge to laugh grows as well. After a while, your laugh can't be contained anymore. You...
1553.title: Visible reactions

choices: REVENGE
MORE TICKLES!
15532.content:
You pull your feet away from the torturous tickles. Feeling defeated you open your eyes to meet your tickler. He was a tall guy, with blond hair, currently shirtless. He wore swim shorts, and had a mixed emotional face. He was happy he won, but sad at the same time. His bare feet were dripping with water. By the looks of it, he just took a swim. He sat down beside you. Your flip flops managed to stay on.
"Why were you tickling me." You ask.
His response was just a finger pointing under the bench. There laid shoes, socks, a shirt, and a bag. These must have been his belongings and his bench. You apologize for taking his spot. You get up and move to another bench. You look back at the mysterious tickler. He laid down on the bench you just left. His are feet were beautiful. High arches, not too wide, not too high, colored in the middle, size 8 by the look of it. Then you realize this is your dream. By now the real tickler had left and probably left a note. So you can do what you want now with a the dream tickler.
15532.title: De-feet

info.brief_description: You're kidnapped by a wicked foot fetishist to fulfill his (and your) desires.
info.description:
You find yourself at the mercy of a twisted foot lover and wicked tickler, determined to get as much enjoyment out of your feet as possible.....little does he know, you're having as much fun as he is...maybe even more!

1. Please, keep things second person (for example "you wake up", "you look around", etc.) This is a story about the reader, try to immerse him/her!
2. Activities of a sexual nature are permitted, but it's preferred that you keep them foot or tickle related (footjobs and the like)
3. Keep a general focus on feet and foot activities, please.
4. As of right now, the main character is neither male or female - it's up to the reader. This story may be revised in the future to have male/female options, but try to keep things gender-neutral for now.
5. No foot torture, please. If you absolutely must include pain, please keep it as light and mild as possible.
6. Be descriptive! Please be as elaborate as possible, detail is always, always, a good thing!
